alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:01PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Converse County through 345 PM MDT... At 300 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Douglas, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas and Laprele Reservoir. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 134 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
